doc:
Peter Scolari https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Scolari 0 Peter Thomas Scolari (born September 12, 1955) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles as Michael Harris on Newhart (1984–1990) and Henry Desmond in Bosom Buddies (1980–1982). Scolari received three Emmy nominations for his work on Newhart and won the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Guest Actor in a Comedy Series for his recurring role as Tad Horvath on Girls in 2016. Peter_Thomas_Scolari ( born September_12_,_1955 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_roles as Michael_Harris on Newhart_(_1984 – 1990_)_and_Henry_Desmond in Bosom_Buddies_(_1980 – 1982_) . Scolari received three_Emmy_nominations for his_work on Newhart and won the_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Guest_Actor in a_Comedy_Series for his_recurring_role as Tad_Horvath on Girls in 2016 .
